page.title: 12FOUR MARKS SCHOOL DAY
page.content: A TYPICAL DAY: My schoolday starts at 6.30 a.m when I wake up. I lie in bed for a while so I can wake up properly and read a book. Then I get out of bed and get dressed. I go downstairs and have my breakfast. I watch television for half an hour and then polish my shoes. Then I go upstairs, clean my teeth and at 8.35 a.m I go to school. When I get to school every morning, I go and see my two best friends. When we get into school, we do some work and at 9.05 we go to assembly. After assembly we usually do some maths until playtime at 10.40 a.m. At 11.00a.m playtime ends and we go back into school. Usually we do English until 12.30 p.m which is lunchtime. Lunch lasts for 1 hour and 15 minutes.
